languageKey.label:
The operating system of your server is %OS%.
  • You have full support.
  • PDF files can converted to SWF / Flash files automatically.

If the detection of the operating system isn't proper, please send a mail to Dirk Wildt (Die Netzmacher)

The operating system of your server is %OS%.
  • PDF files can't converted to SWF / Flash files automatically.
  • But you can convert PDF files to SWF / Flash files manually.

If the detection of the operating system isn't proper, please send a mail to Dirk Wildt (Die Netzmacher)

The operating system of your server is %OS%.
  • PDF files can't converted to SWF / Flash files automatically.
  • But you can convert PDF files to SWF / Flash files manually.

If the detection of the operating system isn't proper, please send a mail to Dirk Wildt (Die Netzmacher)

The PHP function system doesn't exist.

Please check your PHP configuration (php.ini):
  • The function system must not be an element of the ini property disable_functions.
  • If safe_mode is on, the safe_mode_exec_dir must contain the function system.
Please fix the bug. SWFTOOLS won't run without fixing. You don't need SFWTOOLS, but than you have to convert PDF files to SWF / Flash files manually.

SWFTOOLS aren't installed.

Please install SWFTOOLS. If you don't install SFWTOOLS, you have to convert PDF files to SWF / Flash files manually.
If the detection of SWFTOOLS isn't proper, please send a mail to Dirk Wildt (Die Netzmacher)
Download SWFTOOLS for Linux from the TYPO3 TER. SWFTOOLS for Linux
SWFTOOLS for Windows aren't supported now.
You are using TYPO3 4.6. This is perfect!
You have to include the static template ...
Your are using a TYPO3 version greater than 4.6. Flip it! isn't tested in this version. May be you will have unwanted effects. Try it!
Your are using a TYPO3 version smaller than 4.6. Flip it! isn't tested in this version. Try it!
Die Netzmacher - the developers of Flip it!
Pardon, das Betriebssystem wird nicht noch nicht gepräft.
Pardon, die SWF-Tools werden nicht noch nicht gepräft.
Du verwendest TYPO3 4.6. Das ist perfekt!
Du musst das Static Template einbinden ...
Du verwendest eine TYPO3-Version, die groesser ist als 4.6. Flip it! ist fur diese Version nicht getestet. Moeglicherweise bekommst Du unerwartete Ergebnisse. Probier es einfach aus!
Du verwendest eine TYPO3-Version, die kleiner ist als 4.6. Flip it! ist fur diese Version nicht getestet. Moeglicherweise bekommst Du unerwartete Ergebnisse. Probier es einfach aus!
Die Netzmacher - die Entwickler von Flip it!
